## MySQLConnectionOptions.passwordSha1 property

SHA-1 digest of the database user password.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
passwordSha1?: Buffer;
```

## Remarks

Overrides [MySQLConnectionOptions.password](./db-connection-mysql.mysqlconnectionoptions.password.md) option.
